title: VimFu — Scroll Up Half Page
description: Ctrl-U scrolls up half a screen. The opposite of Ctrl-D. Navigate code without losing your place.

setup.comment: Set TERM for proper color support in Neovim
Launch nvim and jump to bottom

steps.say: Last time we scrolled down with Control D. Control U is its partner — half a screen up.
Let's go to the bottom of the file first.
Half a screen up. Cursor stays in the same relative position.
Two presses and we're halfway back up.
Control D and Control U are a pair. Down and back up.
Control U. Half page up. Pair it with Control D to cruise through any file.
